#include <iostream>
#include <vector>
#include <algorithm>
using namespace std;

long long gcd(long long a,long long b)
{
  if(a<b)
    swap(a,b);
  if(a%b==0)
    return b;
  else
    return gcd(a%b,b);
}

long long Binom(long long n,long long k)
{
  if(k<(n/2))
    return Binom(n,n-k);
  long long answer=1;
  vector<long long> zarb;
  vector<long long> taghsim;
  for(int i=2;i<=n;i++)
    {
      //cerr<<"Pushing:"<<i<<endl;
      if(i>k)
	zarb.push_back(i);
    }
  for(int i=2;i<=n-k;i++)
    taghsim.push_back(i);

  //  cerr<<"Zarb:"<<endl;
  //for(int i=0;i<zarb.size();i++)
  //cerr<<zarb[i]<<" ";
  // cerr<<"\nTaghsim:"<<endl;
  //for(int i=0;i<taghsim.size();i++)
  //cerr<<taghsim[i]<<" ";
  //cerr<<endl;
  
  int fin=zarb.size();
  for(int i=0;i<fin;i++)
    {
      answer*=zarb[0];
      //  cerr<<"zarb dar:"<<zarb[0]<<endl;
      zarb[0]=1;
      swap(zarb[0],zarb[zarb.size()-1]);
      zarb.pop_back();
      // cerr<<"for i="<<i<<" : "<<answer<<endl;
      for(int j=0;j<taghsim.size();j++)
	{
	  if(answer<taghsim[j])
	    break;
	  long long g=gcd(answer,taghsim[j]);
	  if(g!=1)
	    {
	      
	      answer/=g;
	      taghsim[j]/=g;
	      if(taghsim[j]==1)
		{
		  swap(taghsim[j],taghsim[taghsim.size()-1]);
		  taghsim.pop_back();
		}
	    }
	}
    }
  
  for(int i=0;i<taghsim.size();i++)
  answer/=taghsim[i];

  return answer;
  
}

int main()
{
  int tests;
  cin>>tests;
  for(int curr=0;curr<tests;curr++)
    {
      long long a,b;
      cin>>a>>b;
      cout<<Binom(a,b)<<endl;
    }
  return 0;
}
